page.title: 12Arts and Crafts in Rye
page.content: In Rye there are many artists and craftsmen. Many show their work in Rye Gallery. Four artists' work is shown each month. They have to be professional, but once a year art from the local Comprehensive school is also shown. There is also an annual exhibition for amateur artists held elsewhere in the town. There has recently been a series of programmes on television about the large community of artists and craftsmen who live in and around Rye. Rye is also well known for its potteries which are a great attraction to the tourists. Pottery has been produced in Rye for several hundred years, and examples going back to the 14th century are on show in the museum.
